title: Design-Based Learning Approach and Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental design principles and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for addressing practical design problems in the social sciences

learning_goals: Learners analyze eight design-based learning approaches (ALD) to diagnose their own learning styles
Learners can assess their competency levels using the three Self-Efficacy in Learning Design (SELD) scales
Learners can design deep learning strategies and establish action plans to improve design self-efficacy by over 20%
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
